headline: Is It Time To Reassess Air Products And Chemicals (APD) After Recent Share Price Rebound?
summary: If you are wondering whether Air Products and Chemicals is attractively priced right now, the stock’s recent moves and current valuation profile give you plenty to think about. The share price closed at US$272.50, with returns of 4.3% over the last 7 days, 10.3% over the last 30 days, 8.8% year to date, but a 16.6% decline over the last year, which may change how investors view its potential and risk. Recent coverage around Air Products and Chemicals has focused on its role as a major...
